name: High2o Rise
description:
Play as a researcher who has come with his research team to discover the truth behind how a whole city has been fully submerged in water. They must dive into the waters and use their scanner to scan hostile fish to learn more about them as well as scanning research files that have been left behind to learn about the history of the city.
